title: Ticket #1539: Wrong headers for libcondorapi in release
description: When we switched from old to new ClassAds, we updated libcondorapi to include the correct object files, but we didn't update the list of header files we release to match. We still release the headers for old ClassAds.
remarks:
2010-Jul-27 17:32:52 by jfrey:
In addition to a few changes in the source files, the following headers need to be included in the release:
  • compat_classad.h
  • compat_classad_list.h
  • compat_classad_util.h
  • stl_string_utils.h
  • classad/*.h

2010-Jul-28 13:41:31 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to master for 7.5.4.
check_ins:
2010-Jul-28 13:35   Check-in [18640]: Add headers files to release for libcondorapi #1539 With the switch to new ClassAds, some additional header files need to be included in the release for users of libcondorapi. (By Jaime Frey )
2010-Jul-28 11:58   Check-in [18639]: Add new imake rule public_recursive_copy_target. #1539 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
